content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Wooden chest at position(x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a wooden chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab and two burner inserters at positions (x=3.5, y=0.5) and (x=0.5, y=3.5) with two wooden chests at positions (x=2.5, y=0.5) and (x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors due to lack of coal in chest
 -  Ensure there is coal in the chest before attempting to use it
### Errors due to lack of pipes in inventory
 -  Ensure there are pipes in the inventory before attempting to place them
### Errors due to lack of coal in inventory
 -  Ensure there is coal in the inventory before attempting to use it
### Errors due to burner mining drill being out of fuel
 -  Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors due to furnace having no ingredients to smelt
 -  Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it
### Errors due to steam engine not being connected
 -  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a boiler and a pipe group before attempting to use it
### Errors due to boiler having no fuel
 -  Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors due to offshore pump not being connected to a pipe group
 -  Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group before attempting to use it
